remarks: Cancel right subtraction inside a distance calculation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
statement:
ngpsubcan.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
ngpsubcan.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
ngpsubcan.d $e |- D = ( dist ` G ) $.
ngpsubcan $p |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A .- C ) D ( B .- C ) ) = ( A D B ) ) $.
